home.title: I'm Nic,
home.description: a Brazilian Software Engineer based in Berlin.I've been working as a Software Engineer for about 2 years with focus on web development using React, Typescript among other technologies.
home.headerAltDescription: Me as a kid looking to the camera with a surprised face in front of a computer. The photo has image effect that makes it beige and dark red. The light parts as the computer, the table and my face are in beige and the dark parts as the chair I'm sitting on and the monitor are in dark red. I'm wearing a striped overall and I have curly hair. In front of my image it's written Nicole Arantes frontend Engineer
